name: 2023 the 9th International Conference on Virtual Reality
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be included in ICVR 2023 conference proceedings, which will be published by IEEE and be archived in IEEE Xplore. The proceedings will be submitted to be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, etc.. ICVR2023 is listed in IEEE Conference List：https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/57957 ★★Selected papers will be recommended to the following journals after at least 30% extension ⚑ Frontiers in Plant Science (SCIE, Q2) ⚑ IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems (SCI, Q2) ⚑ Scientific Reports (Special Issue) (SCI/SCIE, Q3) ⚑ Computer Modeling in Engineering & Sciences (SCIE, Q4)
